text:
Hi all,

I'm trying to make some templates from a marketplace theme unavailable in the child theme.  I've tried cloning those templates to the child theme and setting `isAvailableForNewContent: false` in the template annotations.  However, this doesn't seem to do the trick.  It appears that HubSpot just reverts to showing the template from the parent marketplace theme.  Does anyone know of another way to accomplish this or is it just not possible to do this at this time? Thanks!
Hey everyone!  Does anyone know how to share global content (header and footer) between blog and website pages? Not just the template, but the data as well

Hi All,

Is there a way to add a form in the footer in HubSpot pages? Adding the right side of the wireframe for reference.

Thank you!!

P.S.: we have the Pro X theme.
